product_name: O'Neill Camarilla Capri Surf Leggings - Women's
long_description: Whether you're planning to surf, paddle, swim or just play in the waves, the O'Neill Camarilla Capri Surf Leggings keep you comfortable with soft, quick-drying fabric. The O'Neill Camarilla Capri Surf Leggings include a reflective logo to increase visibility in dim light amd a fun tie at the side to ensure a comfortable fit. Flatlock seams prevent chafing during activity; fabric offers protection rom UV light.
short_description: Whether you're planning to surf, paddle, swim or just play in the waves, the O'Neill Camarilla Capri Surf Leggings keep you comfortable with soft, quick-drying fabric.
